CustomField.formula: IF(FIND(" ",INT_FirstName__c)>0, UPPER(LEFT(INT_FirstName__c,1))+ MID(LOWER(INT_FirstName__c), 2, FIND(" ",INT_FirstName__c)-1)+ " " + UPPER(MID(INT_FirstName__c, FIND(" ",INT_FirstName__c)+1, 1))+ LOWER(MID(INT_FirstName__c, FIND(" ",INT_FirstName__c)+2, Len(INT_FirstName__c)-FIND(" ",INT_FirstName__c)+2)) ,UPPER(LEFT(INT_FirstName__c,1))&Mid(LOWER(INT_FirstName__c), 2, Len(INT_FirstName__c)-1))& " " & IF(FIND(" ",INT_MiddleName__c)>0, UPPER(LEFT(INT_MiddleName__c,1))+ MID(LOWER(INT_MiddleName__c), 2, FIND(" ",INT_MiddleName__c)-1)+ " " + UPPER(MID(INT_MiddleName__c, FIND(" ",INT_MiddleName__c)+1, 1))+ LOWER(MID(INT_MiddleName__c, FIND(" ",INT_MiddleName__c)+2, Len(INT_MiddleName__c)-FIND(" ",INT_MiddleName__c)+2)) ,UPPER(LEFT(INT_MiddleName__c,1))&Mid(LOWER(INT_MiddleName__c), 2, Len(INT_MiddleName__c)-1))& " " & IF(FIND(" ",INT_LastName__c)>0, UPPER(LEFT(INT_LastName__c,1))+ MID(LOWER(INT_LastName__c), 2, FIND(" ",INT_LastName__c)-1)+ " " + UPPER(MID(INT_LastName__c, FIND(" ",INT_LastName__c)+1, 1))+ LOWER(MID(INT_LastName__c, FIND(" ",INT_LastName__c)+2, Len(INT_LastName__c)-FIND(" ",INT_LastName__c)+2)) ,UPPER(LEFT(INT_LastName__c,1))&Mid(LOWER(INT_LastName__c), 2, Len(INT_LastName__c)-1))
CustomField.label: Full Name
